title: Black Minimalist Solid Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a solid black minimalist midi dress, A-line silhouette, short sleeves, crew neckline, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and clean hems, no model, no mannequin, no human, apparel-only
techpack: Solid black A-line midi dress with short sleeves and crew neckline. Constructed from cotton twill with slight spandex for comfort. Invisible back zipper closure, topstitching at neckline and hem, clean finished seams. Regular fit suitable for casual and semi-formal wear.
provenance: Designed based on combination of color:black and print:solids/minimalist trend.
design_text:
Black Minimalist Solid Midi Dress (BLKMINI001)
Colors: black
Fabrics: cotton twill, spandex blend
Prints/Patterns: solid
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short sleeves
Neckline: crew neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: invisible back zipper, topstitching along neckline and hem, clean finished seams
Techpack: available
